extra.enrollment_requirement:
PREREQUISITE    Level 2 or above.
EXCLUSION    No more than 6.0 units from HIST 248/3.0; HIST 249/3.0; HIST 272/6.0

basic.description: A survey of United States history from the beginnings of European colonization until the end of the Civil War, emphasizing social and cultural changes.
basic.subject: HIST
basic.title: United States, Colonization to 1865
